location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch Map of BOUNDARIES OF DISTRICTS OF FARS'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paper.Dimensions: 360 x 485mm, on a sheet 425 x 555mm.

mods.abstract: Sketch map found at folio 53 of 'Biographies of the notables of Fars and certain Persian Officials who have served at Shiraz'.The map bears the statements 'Authority:- Fars - Nameh-i-Nasiri (1895)', and 'Simla Drawing Office No. 3892, June 1924'.
